translation: The envy that ill-intentioned people constantly express to bring you to distress is the most singular thing that can happen. Disregard the machinations of these wicked individuals, and remember that great endeavors are made for great hearts. Isn't it admirable that cousin Cipriano, Felizardo, José Pedro, and Bernardino have tolerated, and perhaps even helped, to spread the rumor of Republics? Indeed, no one can claim not to be deceived. And now, how will they face themselves? Well, let’s move on to other matters. Wednesday, the 23rd, I am departing for there, and I will take care of what I know about myself from here.
